title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 15 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 15 2022
description:
Just as Clay and Buck predicted, NYC terrorist attack disappears from news. Mayor Adams is right about BLM. MSNBC freaks out over Musk-Twitter situation. Senator Bill Hagerty joins Clay and Buck to talk border crisis, the economy, Musk's Twitter takeover attempt and Twitter board's poison pilling of the richest man in the world's offer. C&B take a call on Musk and Twitter.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
